mapper.select: SELECT id FROM ( SELECT id, ROUND( 6378.138 * 2 * ASIN( SQRT( POW( SIN( ( #{lat}* PI() / 180- lat * PI() / 180 ) / 2 ), 2 ) + COS( #{lat} * PI() / 180 ) * COS( lat * PI() / 180 ) * POW( SIN( ( #{lng} * PI() / 180- lng * PI() / 180 ) / 2 ), 2 ) ) ) * 1000 ) AS distance FROM shop s WHERE del_flag = 0 AND shop_status = 1 AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM shop_product WHERE shop_id = s.id AND shop_prod_status = 1 AND del_flag = 0 ) ORDER BY distance ASC LIMIT 1 ) t

select ,
(select count(id) from orders where shop_id = shop.id and order_status in (20,30,31,32) and (create_time BETWEEN subdate(now(), interval 8 hour) AND now() and del_flag = 0)) as orderNum from shop where shop_status = 1
and city = #{city}
and del_flag = 0 and exists (select 1 from shop_product where shop.id = shop_id and shop_prod_status = 1 and del_flag = 0)
